attributes.action: Make St George's Day a National Holiday in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite the fact that St. George has been the patron saint of England since the 14th century, only one in five people know that St. George’s Day falls on 23 April. More than a quarter of people living in England do not even know who their patron saint is! 
Shakespeare was born on 23 April 1564 and he died on the same day in 1616.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
